ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Cycle_Record__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Cycle_Record__r.Start_Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Cycle_Record__r.End_Date__c ) ), OR( Date__c < Cycle_Record__r.Start_Date__c, Date__c > Cycle_Record__r.End_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Symptom Date must fall within the Cycle Record period.
